name: CleanerTwitter (WIP)
description: Clean up Twitter's desktop site by removing elements that aren't commonly used. Works great for small screens to get rid of the clutter!
additional_info:
1.0 - Initial Release
 - Removes Trending from left side
 - Removes Twitter copyright info and links from right side
 - Removes 'Advertise on Twitter' from right side
I plan on adding an option to remove the 'Moments' button from navigation for those that just don't use it. 
Enjoy the release!
